original_text: If you take care of a fig tree, it will give you fruit to eat. If you take care of your master, he will give you honour. If you take care of a fig tree, it will give you fruit to eat.
korean_text: 무화과나무를 지키는 자는 그 과실을 먹고 자기 주인에게 시중드는 자는 영화를 얻느니라

sentences.original_text: If you take care of a fig tree,
it will give you fruit to eat.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 당신에게 먹을 과일을 줄 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: If you take care of your master,
If you take care of a fig tree,
it will give you fruit to eat.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 당신에게 먹을 과일을 줄 것입니다.
